nameAndNumbers.label: Name + Numbers
nameAndNumbers.description: Name your port request for future reference and choose the numbers you want to port.
nameAndNumbers.title: Name this port request and list the numbers you want to port

numbersToPort.title: Numbers to Port
numbersToPort.description: Please input the numbers you wish to port below. Please note that ALL numbers you wish to port MUST be from the same carrier. If the numbers you input below are not from the same carrier, you will need to submit a port request for each carrier that you wish to port from.

placeholders.numbers: Separate individual numbers with a comma

notices.numbers: All numbers must match the selected number type, and be formatted in the same manner.

numbers.phoneNumber: One or more numbers are invalid
numbers.multipleTypes: The listed numbers should include only Standard DID or Toll-free types exclusively
numbers.typeMismatch: The listed numbers do not belong to the selected number type. Please select the right number type above.

file.allNumbers: CSV file read. {{numbersCount}} unique valid numbers extracted.
file.parseError: An error occurred while trying to parse the file. Check if the file exists and the data is properly formatted.
file.noNumbers: CSV file read. However no valid numbers were found, from {{entriesCount}} entries read.
file.someNumbers: CSV file read. {{entriesCount}} entries read, and {{numbersCount}} unique valid numbers extracted.

carrierSelection.label: Carrier Selection
carrierSelection.description: Review numbers, select a winning carrier, and figure out what documents are required for your port.

multipleLosingCarriers.title: Oops! Something is wrong with the numbers you provided.

labels.multipleLosingCarriersDescription: To streamline your porting experience, a .csv output file has been generated for each losing carrier listed below. You will need to take each of these .csv files and submit an individual port request for each losing carrier.
labels.unsupportedCarrierDescription: To streamline your porting experience, a .csv output file has been generated for each losing carrier listed below, so you can review their numbers easily.

countryNotSupported.title: Country not supported
countryNotSupported.message: The numbers that you wish to be ported belong to a country that is not currently supported.

multipleCountries.title: Multiple countries
multipleCountries.message: The numbers that you wish to be ported must belong to the same country. The numbers must also all be portable to the same winning carrier.

multipleLosingCarriers.title: Multiple losing carriers
multipleLosingCarriers.message: The losing carrier must match on each number that you wish to port. The numbers must also all be portable to the same winning carrier.

noWinningCarriers.title: No winning carrier
noWinningCarriers.message: The numbers must all be portable to the same winning carrier.

unknownLosingCarriers.title: Unknown losing carrier
unknownLosingCarriers.message: The losing carrier must be known. The numbers must also all be portable to the same winning carrier.

singleLosingCarrier.title: Please review the selected numbers and designate a winning carrier.

help.winningCarrier: Select a winning carrier based on best quality, from our list of supported carriers

messages.carrierHasChanged: Carrier information has changed. Please check it before continue.

requiredDocuments.title: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: The following documents are required, and must be properly filled out in order for this port request to be submitted.

ownershipConfirmation.label: Ownership Confirmation
ownershipConfirmation.description: Upload and review your most recent invoice from the losing carrier.
ownershipConfirmation.title: Upload a copy of your most recent bill from {{variable}} and verify some key info.

labels.acknowledgeBillDate: I acknowledge the date on this bill is within the last 30 days

help.streetPreDir: A word preceding the street name that indicates the directional taken by the thoroughfare from an arbitrary starting point.
help.streetPostDir: A word following the street name that indicates the directional taken by the thoroughfare from an arbitrary strating point.

locality.equalTo: End-user’s local address should belong to the same city as the number(s) to be ported

country.equalTo: End-user’s service address should belong to the same country as the number(s) to be ported

notices.directionalNotRequired: Not required unless specifically stated on bill.

accountInfo.description: Certain carriers also use an Account Number, a Personal Identification Number (PIN), and/also a Billing Telephone Number (BTN) to identify accounts. If your account contains either of these, you must provide them here.

help.btn: The Billing Telephone Number (BTN) is the number where the subscriber's account is billed and set up.

requiredDocuments.label: Required Documents
requiredDocuments.description: Upload any other required documents and forms for your port request.
requiredDocuments.titleSingleDocument: Due to regulations in your country, {{variable}} is required with your port request.
requiredDocuments.titleMultipleDocuments: Due to regulations in your country, there are {{variable}} documents that are required for this port request

dateAndNotifications.label: Desired Date + Notifications
dateAndNotifications.description: Select a desired target date for this port to complete, and designate who should receive updates.
dateAndNotifications.title: Set a desired target date and designate email notifications.

desiredTargetDate.title: Desired Target Date
desiredTargetDate.description: Please note that we cannot guarantee this date, but will keep you notified of any changes or updates. Keep in mind that port requests can take anywhere from 3 to 30 days, depending on the carrier.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Who should be notified when the status of this port request changes? (Changes can be status updates or notifications requiring additional actions)

review.label: Review + Confirm
review.description: Please review and confirm all your information before submitting your number port request.
review.title: Please review the details of your port request before submitting.

acknowledgements.service: I will not cancel my old service until after the numbers are completely transferred
acknowledgements.canceled: I understand any other numbers on the old account may be cancelled by the losing carrier
acknowledgements.fee: I understand my old carrier may charge an early termination fee
acknowledgements.standard: The numbers in question for this port are standard phone numbers, not featured (like star-ring)

acknowledgement.title: Important
acknowledgement.message: You must read, understand, and agree to all of the following statements before you're able to submit this port request.

errors.phonebookUnavailable: It was not possible to lookup the number information. Check if the Phonebook feature is available for your installation.
errors.lookupNumbersError: An error occurred while trying to lookup for phone numbers information.

file.mimeTypes: Invalid file type. Only {{mimeTypes}} file types are accepted.
file.size: Your file exceeds the allowed max file size ({{maxSize}}Mb)
file.unknownError: An error occurred while reading the CSV file.

documents.CountryInfo: Specific information for a particular country
documents.CustomerID: ID / Passport copy / Company Registration certificate
documents.LegalAuth: Legal proof of Authorization to sign termination document (in case number belongs to company)
documents.LOA: DIDWW LOA for a particular country
documents.ReleaseLetter: Letter of Release from the losing provider
documents.TaxID: Local TAX / VAT ID or company registration number

errors.attachmentNotFound: The document "{{documentName}}" was not found. Please upload it again, if required.
errors.attachmentDownloadFailed: The download of the document "{{documentName}}" failed, so it will not be displayed while editing the current port request.

stageLabels.attachmentSave: The port request was saved. However, not all attachments were saved:
stageLabels.portSave: The port request was not saved. There are one or more problems that need to be addressed:
stageLabels.portUpdateState: The port request could not be submitted due to the following errors:

errors.number_is_on_a_port_request_already: One or more phone numbers are already included in port requests: {{variable}}

numbers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected numbers from your account?

deleteE911Error.message: The following numbers can not be delete as they are the only numbers with e911 set up for their respective accounts. You need at least one number with e911 set up on an account.

numbers.successDelete: You successfully deleted {{count}} phone number(s) from your account(s)
numbers.successMove: You successfully moved {{count}} phone number(s) to the following account: {{ accountName }}
numbers.noSpareNumber: There are no spare numbers in this account.
numbers.noUsedNumber: There are no numbers used in any application for this account.
numbers.helpSpareNumbers: This shows the list of numbers not used anywhere in this account. You can assign those numbers to your sub-accounts or delete these numbers from your account.
numbers.helpUsedNumbers: This list displays where your numbers are used. You can also see the list of numbers used by your sub-accounts.
numbers.notUsedNumber: {{number}}: This number is not used but belongs to {{accountName}}. (Switch to Spare Numbers view to see this number)
numbers.notSpareNumber: {{number}}: This number is not a spare number but is used by {{accountName}}. (Switch to the Numbers in Use view to see this number)
numbers.numberNotFound: The number you searched was not found! Make sure to enter the full number as we don't allow partial searches (but the formatting doesn't matter).

delete.title: Delete Numbers - Confirmation

dialog.title: Add your phone numbers to the platform

dialog.invalidNumbers: We couldn't find any valid phone number to add to the system in the list of numbers you submitted.

forceActivate.help: Unchecking this will only add the numbers to the numbers pool, so they can be purchased via the Number Search tool. Checking the box will add the numbers and purchase them immediately.

numbers.portFeatureIconHelp: This icon means that the number is being ported to the system.

numbers.e911IconHelp: This icon means that you set up e911 for this phone number
numbers.localIconHelp: This icon means that this number is a local number

addEndpointDialog.subTitle: Select people in the dropdown below

numberRenameCarrier.label: Carrier Module
numberRenameCarrier.help: By selecting a module from this list, you will change the carrier module used by the system for that phone number.
numberRenameCarrier.successUpdate: You successfully updated the carrier moduled used by {{phoneNumber}} to be {{carrierName}}

empty.title: There are no active port request for this account.
empty.text: Hmm... this blue button seems important...

info.default: You are about to change the status of this port request. Please make sure you have selected the correct new status before confirming the update.

scheduled.one: You selected the new status as
scheduled.two: . Please add the scheduled date and time below.

rejected.one: You selected the new status as

reason.submitted: Your port request looks good to go! It has been submitted to the carrier for processing on their end.

type_of_service.label: Type of Service
type_of_service.text: Service selected (Business or Residential) is incorrect according to the current carrier's records.

tn_not_portable.label: TN not portable
tn_not_portable.text: This means that the phone number(s) attempting to be ported are in a non-portable status with the current carrier.

porting_main_btn_follow.label: Porting Main BTN
porting_main_btn_follow.text: Porting BTN. Must provide an alternate BTN from remaining numbers on account.

passcode_pin_requried_or_invalid.label: Passcode/PIN Required or Invalid
passcode_pin_requried_or_invalid.text: Indicates that a passcode/PIN was not provided or incorrect on order.

account_number_invalid.label: Account Number Invalid
account_number_invalid.text: This means that the account number provided on the order does not match what the carrier has on file.

account_number_required.label: Account Number Required
account_number_required.text: This means that the carrier is requiring the customer to provide their account number before approving this port.

invalid_auth_name.label: Invalid Auth Name
invalid_auth_name.text: The carrier is indicating that the name you provided is incorrect and does not match their records.

name_mismatch.label: Name Mismatch
name_mismatch.text: The business or residential name on the order does not match that of the carrier’s CSR (Customer Service Record).

carrier_freeze.label: Carrier Freeze
carrier_freeze.text: The EU/Customer has (at one time) requested a freeze to be placed on the account which prevents the numbers from being ported and other account changes.

btn_atn_mismatch.label: BTN / ATN Mismatch
btn_atn_mismatch.text: If the BTN provided on the order does not allow the carrier to pull up the account records, they will reject it back to us indicating the BTN is incorrect.

pending_order.label: Pending Order
pending_order.text: A current order exists on the account.  This order must be completed or closed out.

number_disconnedted_not_active.label: Number Disconnected / Not Active
number_disconnedted_not_active.text: The TN or the account holding the TN is considered disconnected or inactive.

address_mismatch.label: Address Mismatch
address_mismatch.text: This means that the address submitted on the order does not match the address on the losing carrier’s CSR (Customer Service Record).

helpText.scheduled: Ports happen during normal business hours and a specific time can not be guaranteed.

loading.title: Saving your port request...
loading.text: This will take up to two minutes... thanks for your patience.

movingNumbers.title: We are excited you are moving numbers to our service!
movingNumbers.text: First, let's name this request so you can reference it in the future. Names like 'Company office local DIDs' or 'NY office numbers' can help you quickly identify this request once it is submitted or saved.
movingNumbers.label: Port Request Name

numbersType.text1: What type of number will you be requesting to port?

verifyOwner.title: We need to verify ownership of the numbers you wish to port.
verifyOwner.text1: As is required by law, please upload a bill that you have received within the last 30 days as proof that these are your numbers.
verifyOwner.text2: This proof of your account and ownership is required by law.

accountVerification.title: Now that your bill is uploaded, let's confirm some key information.
accountVerification.text: Please make sure that the information you enter is exactly as it shows on your bill. If there are any discrepancies between your port request and your bill, carriers will automatically reject your request.

form.text: Certain carriers also use an Account Number, a Personal Identification Number (PIN), and/also a Billing Telephone Number (BTN) to identify accounts. If your account contains either of these, you must provide them here.

label.acknowledgeBill: I acknowledge the date on this bill is within the last 30 days

addNumbers.title: Enter the numbers you wish to port from the bill.
addNumbers.text1: To avoid delays ensure you only enter {{variable}} that belong to the bill you uploaded.
addNumbers.text2: If you wish you can add multiple numbers at once by separating them by a single space.
addNumbers.text3: Enter each number without any parentheses, dashes or spaces.

list.title: Numbers on This Port Request
list.text: You have not added any numbers to your port request yet.

portion.errorMessage: It looks like you selected your current account's BTN as a number to be ported. This will cause this port request to be denied from the carrier unless you specify the nature of these numbers below.
portion.text1: Do these numbers make up the entire current account per your bill?
portion.text2: Or do these numbers make up only a select portion of numbers?

btn.title: Partial Port Additional Requirements
btn.text: Because you have selected to port your current account's BTN and your request will consist of only a portion of your account's numbers, you will need to choose a new BTN for that carrier or they will reject your request to port these numbers.
btn.label: New BTN

eSign.loa: Next - LoA Form (E-sign enabled on account)
eSign.resporg: Next - RespOrg Form (E-sign enabled on account)

uploadForm.title: We'll need a signed copy of your {{variable}}
uploadForm.text: Please download the pre-generated {{variable}} form, double check the info is correct and sign it, then re-upload it.

doubleCheck.title: Step 2
doubleCheck.text: Double check all the info and numbers on your {{variable}} to confirm that they are correct, and then sign your {{variable}} form.

signForm.title: For your convenience, you will be able to electronically sign you {{variable}}.
signForm.text: Please review your {{variable}} form below, and then e-sign it before continuing on with this port request.

portNotify.title: Let us know who to notify of changes and choose a desired port date.
portNotify.text: Please fill out the last bits of information below.

email.text1: Who should we notify when the status of this port request changes?
email.text2: (Changes can be status updates or notifications requiring further action).
email.label: Notify by Email

target.text1: When would you like this port to occur?
target.text2: Please note that we cannot guarantee this date, but will keep you notified of any changes or updates.
target.text3: Port requests can take anywhere from 3 to 30 days, depending on the carrier.
target.label: Target Date

portSubmit.title: You're almost ready to submit your request to port {{variable}} numbers.
portSubmit.text: Please review you request and acknowledge the four (4) statements below. When you are ready, go ahead and submit your port request.

label.service: I will not cancel my old service until after the numbers are completely transfered
label.canceled: I understand any other numbers on the old account may be canceled by the old provider
label.fee: I understand my old carrier may charge an early termination fee
label.standard: There are standard phone numbers, not featured (like star-ring)

numberFeaturesMenu.syncSuccess: You successfully synced {{number}} with the system.

storageSelector.subTitle: Please select from the following storage options available on this account

storagePlanManager.noPlans: No Plans Configured on this Account.
storagePlanManager.notConfigured: This plan is not configured yet. Click here to choose a storage option.
storagePlanManager.mainTitleWithPlans: It looks like this account doesn't have any storage configured for this plan yet.
storagePlanManager.subTitleWithPlans: There are {{variable}} storage options detected on your account, please select one to enable this plan.
storagePlanManager.mainTitleNoPlans: You don't have any connector configured on your account.
storagePlanManager.subTitleNoPlans: You need to enable Integrations app (like AWS Connector or Google Drive Connector) in order to use a Storage Plan.
storagePlanManager.confirmChange: Changing storage options will reset all your current folder configurations for storing saved files. If you choose to continue, you will have to reconfigure all the storage folders for this plan on this account.
storagePlanManager.confirmDeleteText: This will remove this Storage plan from this account.
storagePlanManager.successUpdate: Your Storage Settings were successfully updated!
storagePlanManager.successPathUpdate: You successfully updated the path where this storage plan will store its files.

deleteDialog.title: Remove {{ name }} from the system
deleteDialog.headerAdmin: You're about to delete an ADMIN! Deleting an admin will delete his user, voicemail boxes and unassign his devices. It will also prevent them from managing this UI. Do you want to continue?
deleteDialog.headerUser: Deleting a user will delete this user and his Voicemail Box, and unassign the devices and numbers that were assigned to this user. Do you want to continue?
deleteDialog.deleteDevices: Also remove this user's devices from the system
deleteDialog.deleteDevicesHelp: If you leave this option unchecked, we'll just unassign these devices and they will show up in the list of Spare Devices
deleteDialog.__comment: UI-2467: also remove conferences when deleting a user from smartpbx
deleteDialog.deleteConferences: Also remove this user's conferences from the system
deleteDialog.deleteConferencesHelp: If you leave this option unchecked, you won't be able to use the user's conference number anywhere else, as it will still be used by that conference.

noApps.account: There are no applications available on this account.
noApps.user: There are no applications available for the current user.

numberIm.label: Messaging
numberIm.help: Enable or Disable messaging feature for this number.
numberIm.successUpdate: You successfully updated the messaging configuration for {{phoneNumber}}
